title: Band, mid-18th century
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Band of Point d'Alençon in an open design of floral sprays. Fond: bride bouclée. Modes: petit réseau, enchainettes.
